text: Ignacy Jan Paderewski, GBE (; 29 June 1941) was a Polish pianist and composer, politician, and spokesman for Polish independence. He was the prime minister and foreign minister of Poland in 1919. He represented Poland at the Paris Peace Conference in 1919. ==References== Category:1860 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Prime ministers of Poland Category:Polish composers Category:Polish pianists
title: Ignacy Jan Paderewski
